name: Short Sword
desc: A simple short sword, made so that even the untrained can use it.

name: Gladius
desc: A short skirmishers blade.

name: Long Sword
desc: A common soldiers sword.

name: War Sword
desc: A heavy blade best used with all your might.

name: Peace Keeper
desc: A finely crafted blade, favored by he knighthood.

name: Bastard Sword
desc: A large sword that can be used with one hand or two.

name: Ulfberht
desc: A deadly type of sword favored by the Vikangn.

name: Avenger
desc: A deadly sword, often used in duels.

name: Veinslay
desc: A sword forged from the talons of a mighty dragon.

name: Glandria
desc: A mysterious sword often spoken of in myth as the Hero Maker.

name: Oak Staff
desc: A length of finely crafted wood, favored by clerics .

name: Novice Staff
desc: A staff infused with some magic, given to students.

name: Cleric Staff
desc: A blessed staff used by church healers.

name: Staff
desc: A blessed staff made of Ash Wood.

name: Celestial Staff
desc: A divine master healers staff.

name: Starlight Staff
desc: A powerful clerics staff that shines like a star.

name: Dragon Staff
desc: A staff said to hold the spirit of a Gold Dragon.

name: Arch Cleric Staff
desc: A staff given only to the most accomplished of healers.

name: Abraxa
desc: This staff embodies the skill and power of a legendary cleric.

name: Nirvana
desc: This divine staff is said to have been a gift from a lost Goddess.
